articles.description: Later this year, NASA's Parker Solar Probe will come even closer to the sun than it has before, while traveling at record-breaking speeds.
articles.content:
NASA's Parker Solar Probe has already gotten closer to the sun
 than any other human-made object. Yet, later this year, the star-skimming spacecraft will get even closer — all while traveling faster… [+2951 chars]
